2019 APEC FORUM ON DIGITAL INNOVATION AND YOUTH ENTREPRENEURSHIP:
Building Capacity and Collaborative Connectivity for Young Entrepreneurs

The project intends to develop capacity through the transfer and development of knowledge, skills and technical know-how among experienced entrepreneurs and entrepreneurs-to-be from various Asia-Pacific economies. Entrepreneurial education is a process relying on the transfer of knowledge and ingenuity from successful entrepreneurs to entrepreneurs-to-be, leading to long-term capacity building and innovation initiatives. We are focusing on the most needed and transformative sectors of the digital economy, which offer promise of sustained and sustainable growth and inclusive employment. One of the major themes of the workshop is female entrepreneurship, related to inspiring female creativity and improving gender inclusion. Experience sharing during the workshop will further facilitate both internal and regional replicability through dissemination of acquired skills within the participants’ home economies and other regional sectors.

The 3-day event will include:

  • Introduction and Best Practices of Government and Academia Programs on Youth Innovative Entrepreneurship
  • APEC Regional Startup Experience & Knowledge Sharing
  • Startup Pitching Demo
  • Startup Education Achievement Exhibition
  • Panel Session of Female Entrepreneurship
  • Digital Industry Field Visits

Date

  • October 7th – 8th 2019 for both local and Asia-Pacific guests
  • October 9th 2019 for Asia-Pacific guests

Target

Students/ Startup Instructors / Entrepreneurs and Entrepreneurs-to-be Under 30 / Government Officials in Related Sector

Venue

GIS TAIPEI TECH Convention Center, National Taipei University of Technology

Charges & Expenses

Free admission; free food during the event

Accommodation

  • Qualified local attendees from outside Greater Taipei and participating in the first 2-day conference will be provided with free accommodation for up to 3 nights (Oct. 6th - Oct. 8th).
  • Attendees from APEC member economies are provided with free accommodation for 4 nights (Oct. 6th - Oct. 9th).

Application Link

Results

The result of the selection process will be sent to you at the e-mail address provided in your application. Please fill out the form attached in the email to complete the registration for the event before August 30, 2019.

Please contact us through email if you are qualified but has not received the e-mail.

For Asia-Pacific Applicants

Please contact the Education Division of your local Taipei Economic and Cultural Office for more information on the application procedure or send your inquires via email to ntutproject2019@gmail.com.
